     <font size="7">
      Tropical 
 Lycaenidae
     </font>
    </p>
   </center>
   <center>
    <p>
     <img height="291" src="Arhopala1a.jpg" width="700"/>
    </p>
   </center>
   <center>
    <p>
     <i>
      Arhopala eumolphus adonias
     </i>
     (Hewitson 1862); Indonesia, East Java
    </p>
   </center>
   <p>
   </p>
   <p align="center">
    <font size="5">

       <i>

       </i>
       -Group" 
 sensu
      </span>
      <span style="text-decoration: none; font-variant: small-caps">
       Eliot
      </span>
     </a>
    </font>

       </i>
       <span style="font-variant: small-caps">
        Hübner
       </span>
       1819

     </a>
